Stops Autoplay when Free Spins is won.
To access game settings, click the spanner icon in the game panel.
Game Setting Options

During the Locked Up feature, only Locked Up symbols and Golden Locked Up symbols will appear on the reels. 
3 or more connected Locked Up or Golden Locked Up symbols form a winning cluster.
The Locked Up symbols on the row are grouped together on the same row and assigned a random coin value of 1-10 x bet value.
The game is played with 1-10 bet levels (20 coins per level) and different coin values.
3 or more Scatter symbols appearing anywhere on the reels activate 10 Free Spins.
3 Scatter symbols appearing anywhere on reels 1, 3, and 5 in the main game activate 10 Free Spins.
In Free Spins, the Drive-by feature activates on every spin if 3 Wild symbols appear on the reels.
Additional Information
To set advanced autoplay options click AUTOPLAY, and then click Advanced settings.
Advanced Autoplay Settings
Note: If you are disconnected while playing, all Autoplay settings will return to default when you reload the game.
Note: When changing Autoplay settings during a game round or Free Spins, all settings will take effect once the game round or feature is completed.
Note: When changing Autoplay settings during a game round or Free Spins, all settings will take effect once the game round or feature is completed.
Note: Some autoplay options are mandatory for some jurisdictions.
Note: Some Autoplay settings are mandatory for some jurisdictions.
AUTOPLAY automatically plays the game for the selected number of rounds.
Select the number of spins to Autoplay or view the Advanced Settings to configure stop Autoplay options.
Click to go back to the main game.
Bet level is the number of coins bet per bet line.
Bet level is the number of coins bet per bet way.
The bet level is set using the LEVEL selector.
BET shows the total bet in coins.
A bet way win in coins is equal to the value shown in the Paytable multiplied by the bet level. This amount is also multiplied by any applicable multipliers.

The game is played with clusters of symbols, 1-10 bet levels (20 coins per level) and different coin values.
This extra spin will be played after the current spin and will be counted as the last Free Spin.
9 or more symbols appearing in a cluster award a win according to the Paytable.
COINS displays the number of coins available to wager.
BALANCE displays the amount of cash or coins available to bet.
The coin value is set using the COIN VALUE selector.
At the end of the Drive-by feature, the total win resulted from Drive-by is added to the balance.
More bet line wins are created when additional instances of the symbol appear on the same reels that create the longest bet line win.
More bet way wins are created when additional instances of the symbol appear on the same reels that create the longest bet way win.
Only the longest matching combination per symbol is paid.
This upgrade can happen 7-15 times for each time the feature is activated.
Click to exit Free Spins.
Tap to exit Free Spins.
At the end of Free Spins, the total win from Free Spins is added to any wins from the round that activated Free Spins.
Free Spins are played at the same bet level and coin value as the round that activated Free Spins.
Free Spins
Free Spins are played at the same bet as the round that activated Free Spins.
Click to enter Free Spins.
Tap to enter Free Spins.
Stops Autoplay when Free Spins are won.
During Free Spins, the Wild symbols have the same behavior as in the main game. This means that if there is a win on the Wild symbols, the Wild symbols move one reel to the left on the next spin.

If multiple Golden Locked Up symbols appear simultaneously then the value is updated between them. This means that all the Golden Locked Up symbols are assigned a value before the symbols start revealing the value.
During the Locked Up feature, the Golden Locked Up symbols can unlock one of the following features: Multiplier, Upgrade symbols and Big starting value.
If more than one Golden Locked Up symbol appears during the same spin, the symbol starts revealing the value horizontally from leftmost to rightmost.
At the start of the feature, the bet values for the Golden Locked Up symbols are the same as for the regular Locked Up symbols. This value can change.
Click to view the Paytable.
Turns the intro movie on or off.
Narcos is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot with 243 bet ways. The game features Free Spins, Walking Wilds, Drive-by, and a Locked Up feature with a Golden Locked Up symbol.
Narcos Touch is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot with 243 bet ways. The game features Free Spins, Walking Wilds, Drive-by, and a Locked Up feature with a Golden Locked Up symbol.
Turns the intro screen on or off.
During the main game, the Locked Up feature is activated when 3 or more Locked Up symbols appear on the same row.
At the end of the Locked Up feature, the total win from Locked Up feature is added to any wins from the round that activated the Locked Up feature.
Locked Up Button
During the Locked Up feature, the symbols form clusters to award coin wins.
The Locked Up feature is played at the same bet level and coin value as the spin that activated the feature. The bet level and coin value cannot be changed during the Locked Up feature.
At the end of the Locked Up feature, the game returns to the round that activated the Locked Up feature.
When no more spins are left or the game area is completely filled with Locked Up or Golden Locked Up symbols, the Locked Up feature ends and the wins are awarded.
The player starts the Locked Up feature with 3 spins.
Additionally, Golden Locked Up symbols with Big starting value have an additional amount of Coins assigned to them, which can be 11, 12, 13, 16 or 26 times the total bet.
After the feature is activated, the Locked Up symbols move together in the form of a cluster.
All Locked Up symbols from the main game stay on the game area and move towards the center forming a cluster.
Locked Up and Golden Locked Up symbols that land on the reels but are not part of a winning cluster stay on the reels. These symbols will have no value until they are connected to a winning cluster.
During every spin if new Locked Up or Golden Locked Up symbols appear, creating a new winning cluster or adding to an existing cluster, the number of remaining spins resets to 3.
Each Locked Up and Golden Locked Up symbol in a cluster is assigned a value. The value assigned to the symbols  can be 1, 2, 3, 5 or 10 times the total bet.
In the event of malfunction of the gaming hardware/software, all affected game bets are rendered void and all affected bets are refunded.
MAX BET plays the game at 243 bet ways, the highest bet level, and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.
Drag or tap the slider to enable autoplay to set the autoplay options and the number of rounds. Autoplay plays the game for the selected number of spins.
Note: If you are disconnected while playing, all Autoplay settings will return to default when you reload the game.

Bet way wins pay if in succession from leftmost reel to right.

Big starting value:  An additional value is added to the Golden Locked Up symbol as a starting value.
Narcos Game Rules
Narcos Touch Game Rules
Multiplier: All symbol values of the winning cluster are multiplied by either x2 or x3 multiplier.

Upgrade Symbols: During this feature, multiple upgrade values in increment of 1 times the total bet can be assigned to symbols that are part of the same cluster as the Golden Locked Up symbol. This upgrade can happen 7-15 times for each time the feature is activated.
There are no bet lines.

Click the arrows pointing to the left or right to scroll through the PAYTABLE pages. Click the x button to return to the game.
In Free Spins, on every spin there is a chance that one or more high value symbols turn into Wilds. This is in accordance with the game rules for Drive-by feature.

Translations of Game Terminology
The procedures used to manage unfinished game rounds.
During the main game and Free Spins, if any feature gets activated while there are Walking Wilds still present on the reels, the Walking Wilds continue to stay on the reels after the feature is over.
The Walking Wild feature ends if there are no longer any wins from the Walking Wilds or if the wager is increased.
At the end of Free Spins, if there are Walking Wilds still left on the reels, an extra Free Spin is awarded. This continues until there are no Walking Wilds present on the reels.
Wild symbols can appear anywhere on the reels and substitute for all symbols.
Wild symbol substitution pays the highest possible winning combination in a cluster according to the Paytable.
The Drive-by feature can activate randomly in the main game.
A bet way win in coins is equal to the value shown in the PAYTABLE multiplied by the bet level.
A bet way win in currency is equal to the win in coins multiplied by the coin value.

Translations of Game Terminology
Where the game is not decided, the bet will be returned to the player.
An unfinished game round may be due to poor internet connection.
Unfinished game rounds resume either automatically after a short delay or by restarting the game.
If a game round is not resumed by 3:00 AM, the player will get his or her winnings for any settled game.
Unfinished Game Rounds
Any game rounds that, for some reason, have not been completed, are stored on the server.
An unfinished game round is stored on the server along with the current bet.
A bet way win in coins is equal to the value shown in the Paytable multiplied by the bet level.
Winning combinations and payouts are made according to the Paytable.
